title: Tenchi Souzou Design-bu
overview: In Tenchi Souzou Design-bu, designers create a variety of new animals daily while contending with the unreasonable requests of their client: God. This series answers questions such as, "Why can't unicorns exist?", "What makes an animal taste delicious?", "What's the most powerful creature in the ocean?", and, "Bird versus snake: who would win?".
